overview:
Paul Turner is responsible for planning and management of Venafi’s products as well as overseeing engineering, quality assurance, product management, and professional services.

Prior to joining Venafi, Turner was vice president of Marketing and Product Management for Resource Management at Novell. While at Novell, he also held leadership positions in Collaboration, Secure Identity Management, Content Distribution, and Internet Products and was responsible for driving market and revenue growth in each of those businesses. During the late nineties, he served as vice president of Product Management at CertCo, a spinout from Bankers’ Trust delivering PKI and secure electronic commerce solutions to the financial services industry.
